song.title: God of this City
song.lyrics:
[1] . C You're the God of this city . G/B You're the King of these people . Am7 You're the Lord of this nation . F You are
[P] .Am7 G/B F There is no one like our God .Am7 G/B F G There is no one like our God
[C] .F Greater things have yet to come .G Greater things are still to be done . C G/B Am7 In this city || .F Greater things have yet to come .G C Greater things are still to be done here
---
[2] . C You’re the light in this darkness . G/B You’re the hope to the hopeless . Am7 You’re the peace to the restless . F You are
